title: Largest cities in Ukraine 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Residents in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.
The highest value at Month Kyïv (Kiev) is 6.47x times more than the lowest value at Mariupol'.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Residents in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Residents in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions and Mariupol' has the lowest Residents in millions.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Residents in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Residents in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Kyïv (Kiev) and lowest at Month Mariupol'.
Second maximum Residents in millions is found at Month Charkiv.
There is a difference of 2.46 between the maximum Month Kyïv (Kiev) and minimum Month Mariupol'.
The Month Kyïv (Kiev) has the highest Residents in millions, followed by Charkiv, and Odėsa. Down to the Month Mariupol' which is the lowest.
Over the past 10 Months, the Residents in millions has lowered.
The Month Kyïv (Kiev) has 2.81 times more Residents in millions than average.
